title: Sleepiest
review: Sleepiest is amazing! They have plenty of sounds that you can listen to for free and even can earn some for free!(why I‚Äôm doing this review) I have a lot of trouble falling asleep every night before sleepiest but sleepiest has the sounds that I enjoy nonstop with no ads! title: Like the Sounds & Stories
review: Have tried other sleep apps, but this one sound effects sound so genuine. The stories are very soothing, calming & relaxing. I can never get to the end before I know it I have drifted off to sleep. Enjoy the peace & relaxation it gives me to fall asleep.

title: So soothing
review: If you deal with bouts of insomnia, give this one a try.

title: Good but some problems
review: Hello this app is good for stories not bedtime ones just to let you know
